name: The Pirates of Dark Water
overview: Set sail for a swashbuckling search! The Pirates of Dark Water puts you in the middle of the popular Saturday morning cartoon! Sail from island to island as one of three warrior heroes. Become Ren, the young heir to the throne and leader of the quest. Or choose Tula, the spirited heroine whose skills are as dazzling as her beauty. Or Ioz, the fortune hunting ex-pirate who's ready for action! The action will be fast and furious, so cast off! And let the hunt begin!
